intro: Elatostema laciniatum var. laciniatum, commonly known as the slender leaf elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa, particularly in countries such as Kenya and Tanzania. The plant is characterized by its small, opposite leaves that are often deeply lobed or notched, giving it a distinctive appearance. It produces clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers that are typically borne on short pedicels. The plant is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest undergrowth or along stream banks.
